title: Linux version of Qilin ransomware focuses on VMware ESXi
description: A sample of the Qilin ransomware gang's VMware ESXi encryptor has been found and it could be one of the most advanced and customizable Linux encryptors seen to date. [...]

title: North Korea's state hackers stole $3 billion in crypto since 2017
description: North Korean-backed state hackers have stolen an estimated $3 billion in a long string of hacks targeting the cryptocurrency industry over the last six years since January 2017. [...]

title: Google is phasing out ad personalization for some AdSense products
description: Google has announced significant changes to its Search Ads publisher products, including AdSense for Search (AFS), AdSense for Shopping (AFSh), and Programmable Search Engine (ProSE). [...]

title: New proxy malware targets Mac users through pirated software
description: Cybercriminals are targeting Mac users with a new proxy trojan malware bundled with popular, copyrighted macOS software being offered on warez sites. [...]
